content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. I'm pleased to meet you. I understand that you are interested in renting my apartment in Magdeburg. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay for this newly built, unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The apartment is nice but I am a student so I am very price-sensitive. I am willing to pay 300 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 300 euros per month is much lower than my expectations for this apartment. It's a prime location and I've invested a significant amount in its construction. Would you be willing to reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. However, as a student, I have a limited budget. Would you be willing to lower the price considering that the apartment is unfurnished? I would also need to pay for furniture.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your situation as a student, but I must maintain a fair price for my investment. The location of the apartment, close to all amenities, adds significant value. Could you perhaps offer a bit more?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand the location is great. However, I am not willing to pay more than 350 euros per month. I can provide a good tenant who will take good care of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 350 euros per month is still below my expectations, but considering your situation as a student and your willingness to take care of the apartment, I'm willing to accept this offer. Let's proceed with the paperwork. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
